summary: REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3 appear implemented at the configuration level (manifest, HTML meta/manifest link, SW registration and fetch handler). However, the required icon image files are not present in the diff, and the diff shows many non-PWA application changes that violate the stated constraint/non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the generated MYL bullseye PNG icon files (192x192 and 512x512) at the paths referenced by the manifest so they load successfully (no 404).
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest and index.html reference `/assets/generated/myl-bullseye-icon.dim_192x192.png` and `/assets/generated/myl-bullseye-icon.dim_512x512.png`, but the diff shows no added image files. Without the actual PNGs, the AC about icons loading successfully cannot be satisfied.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of non-PWA UI/feature changes across multiple React components (intro overlay behavior, upload dropdown actions, speech-to-text dictation, gallery selection/move/delete for notes, sign-out/cache clearing, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains changes to PWA installability/branding only and lists non-goals as adding new non-PWA features/flows. The diff summary indicates substantial unrelated feature work.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions modifications to many files under frontend/src/* including App.tsx, HomePage.tsx, Header.tsx, FileUploadSection.tsx, GallerySection.tsx, etc.)

hallucinated_features.description: Service worker implements runtime caching, precaching, offline navigation fallback, cache trimming, and skip-waiting/update messaging logic beyond the minimal installability requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals disallow offline-first product changes beyond what is required for Chrome PWA installability. The sw.js description shows a fairly involved caching/offline strategy rather than a minimal fetch handler for installability.
Not requested by any REQ; BuildRequest focuses on manifest/index.html/sw.js and icon assets.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json to track AR items/status.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of requested PWA installability implementation requirements; no REQ mentions project_state.json.
